title: Ticket #1626: Make CCB default to on
description: The only reason CCB isn't on by default is that it's not compatible with pre-7.6.0 stable releases. For 7.7.x and 7.8.0, we should declare a lack of compatibility with 7.4.x for the benefit of removing yet another bit of configuration to worry about. Just turn CCB on by default.
creator: adesmet
